name: Git integration
description:
Plugin that enables git calls from ninja-ide. It use a window for managing git calls.

It supports:
*add git support for project
*stage,unstage,commit,uncommit files
*create,change,merge,delete branches
*Highlight changes in files(diff)

Heres a video showing de plugin in action.

http://youtu.be/U4xjL0bWXUA


Github Repo:

https://github.com/luis8/Git

name: taskPlugin
description: This plugin allows toi organize your task(s) in NINJA-IDE. It works with #FIXME: #TODO: #OPTIMIZE:

name: DocGen
description: Plugin to generate docstring templates for functions, classes and modules. There are example Sphinx templates provided, but you can also create your very own templates using the settings window.

name: setupy
description: Ninja Setup.py Creator plugin, Automatically detects and fill all the needed information from the actual project, variable indentation, customizable imports, optional SheBang and Metadata, Nose Test integration, option to copy the generated setup.py to Clipboard, easy to use, no dependencies.

name: pyqtdoc
description: Simple PyQt4 Doc API Reference plugin, implemented on one line, Opens online RiverBank Documentation, No GUI it adds one Menu entry, No Dependencies.

name: base64
description: Detachable Base64 Data URI Encoder plugin for Ninja-IDE, easy to use, includes AutoCompleter for file paths, Automatic MIME-Type guessing and manual entry fallback if guessing fails, Basic Caesar Cipher supported, with or without standard header, optional "copy to clipboard", useful for CSS and Web Dev, Check for file sizes and display a Warning if target file is too big, Automatically Generate Template Code for Embed on Python, CSS, HTML, QML and JS, no dependencies, Contextual sub-menu on Project Explorer. Simple Mode or Full Mode for better UX.

name: diff
description:
Ninja-IDE Diff and Patch Detachable Multiprocess GUI,
graphical difference viewer and generator that allows you to visualize changes to a file or compare files line by line, view patches generated by diff, merge a patch into an existing file, uses GNU Diff as Back-end, similar to Meld.

name: ninja-debugger-plugin
description:
The ninja-debugger-plugin allows to debug a python script from Ninja-IDE, set breakpoints, add watches and move step by step on your code.

-*- Beta Version -*-

What's new?

- 0.4.2 beta

    * Fixed issue #7 Cannot continue when no thread is selected.
    * Fixed issue #8 Cannot remove breakpoints with relative paths.

- 0.4.1 beta

    * Fixed issue #5

- 0.4 beta

    * Mouse hover handler to evaluate expressions when mouse is over.

- 0.3 beta

    * Multithreading support.
    * Django debugging support.
    * Improved run mechanism to use ninja's run method. [Issue #1]

name: pluginProject
description: This NINJA-IDE Plugin allows to create Plugins for NINJA... Wow Recursive!

name: RubySymbols
description: This plugins allows Ruby programmers to see the symbols contained in ruby files in the Symbols tab, and use the Code Locator to find their classes, functions, attributes and files in Ruby files.
